EESAVE.description: Preserve EEPROM through the Chip Erase cycle

256W_4F00.description: Boot Flash size=256 words Boot address=$4F00

512W_4E00.description: Boot Flash size=512 words Boot address=$4E00

1024W_4C00.description: Boot Flash size=1024 words Boot address=$4C00

2048W_4800.description: Boot Flash size=2048 words Boot address=$4800

LPM_SPM_DISABLE.description: LPM and SPM prohibited in Application Section

NO_LOCK.description: No lock on SPM and LPM in Application Section

LPM_SPM_DISABLE.description: LPM and SPM prohibited in Boot Section

NO_LOCK.description: No lock on SPM and LPM in Boot Section

VADMUX.description: Analog Channel and Gain Selection Bits

VADCSR.description: The VADC Control and Status register

BPOCD.description: Battery Protection OverCurrent Detection Level Register

BPSCD.description: Battery Protection Short-Circuit Detection Level Register

BPDUV.description: Battery Protection Deep Under Voltage Register

DUVIF.description: Deep Under-voltage Early Warning Interrupt Flag

COCIF.description: Charge Over-current Protection Activated Interrupt Flag

DUVIE.description: Deep Under-voltage Early Warning Interrupt Enable

PWMOC.description: Pulse Width Modulation of OC output

PWMOPC.description: Pulse Width Modulation Modulation of OPC output

CADCSRA.description: CC-ADC Control and Status Register A

CADEN.description: When the CADEN bit is cleared (zero), the CC-ADC is disabled. When the CADEN bit is set (one), the CC-ADC will continuously measure the voltage drop over the external sense resistor RSENSE. In Power-down, only the Regular Current detection is active. In Power-off, the CC-ADC is always disabled.

CADSI.description: The CADSI bits determine the current sampling interval for the Regular Current detection in Power-down mode. The actual settings remain to be determined.

CADSE.description: When the CADSE bit is written to one, the ongoing CC-ADC conversion is aborted, and the CC-ADC enters Regular Current detection mode.

CADCSRB.description: CC-ADC Control and Status Register B

RWWSRE.description: Read While Write section read enable

TWBCSR.description: TWI Bus Control and Status Register

TWGCE.description: TWI General Call Recognition Enable Bit

BGD.description: Setting the BGD bit to one will disable the bandgap voltage reference. This bit must be cleared before enabling CC-ADC or V-ADC, and must remain unset while either ADC is enabled.

BGCC.description: BG Calibration of PTAT Current Bits

ERASE_AND_WRITE_IN_ONE_OPERATION.description: Erase and Write in one operation

RESET.description: External Pin, Power-on Reset, Brown-out Reset and Watchdog Reset
